mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (no, title, content, hit, reg_date, user_no) VALUES( seq_board_pk.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, title, content, hit, reg_date as regDate, user_no as userNo, name as userName FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no
SELECT no, title, content, hit, reg_date as regDate, user_no as userNo FROM board where no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE board set hit = hit+1 where no = #{no}
UPDATE board set content=#{content}, title=#{title} WHERE no = #{no}
